metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, New Friendly has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Melodic Complexity and Chord Progression Novelty and below-average scores in Chord Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: New Friendly has sections analyzed in the following keys: A Major,  and B Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
